name: trendspotter
title: Trendspotter
article:
Trendspotter is a template for curated websites, making it easy for users to discover, save, and manage content through a personal dashboard.


  • Learn more about Trendspotter
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

Pages included

  2. About
  3. Membership
  4. Advertise
  5. Sign in
  6. Sign up
  7. Reset password
  8. Saved resources (CC)
  9. Blog (CC)
  10. Store (CC)
  11. Tag index

  13. RSS
  14. 404
  15. Legal pages (CC)



CC = Content Collections

Features

  • Reusable components
  • User dashboard
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind CSS Prose
